urls.title: Water companies illegally dumping sewage in England and Wales' rivers
urls.description: Treatment works are allowed to release sewage into waterways after heavy rain to stop it backing up.

tweets.text:
Rather curiously there hasn't been a single Tweet from the @EnvAgency in the last 24 hours bragging about how they 'Enhance", the environment.

https://t.co/WaaFQXr1lZ

Anyone know why builders at Mitcham Bridge are dumping waste into the River Wandle? I recorded this today at 3:15. #wandle @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council https://t.co/czmoLpKGHd

RT a thoroughly fantastic day spent with @scouseflowers looking at our meadows, talking seeds, resowing & community led projects of course including our bio haven floating islands @lpoolcouncil @AlsopRESPECT20 @bloodyromans @EnvAgency @TNLComFund @LJMU @JohnnieMaguire https://t.co/soP4DtM8x0

@Feargal_Sharkey @OldDorset @EnvAgency I watched this because you‚Äôd tweeted about it. Having lived near the Wye for years we often noticed the water changing but hadn‚Äôt fully understood what was going on. Fortunately live upstream of any sewage processing plants now but notice farmers pumping slurry in now

@save_our_fields I am terribly sorry. Thank you for doing your best. This Government is just against the preservation of wildlife - this is their disgrace and that of the local council. Shame on you @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @pow_rebecca @MPGeorgeEustice @AvantHomes

tweets.text: #stopthestink Smell is reaching Keele village and @KeeleUniversity. Must be much worse nearer the dump. Totally unacceptable. Do something please @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA # https://t.co/cVozfx2Yyq
Yeah exactly @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids monitor that . Your making people feel like this doesn‚Äôt matter to you https://t.co/ZZ6iizBqMi
Am I missing something here, how can regulatory bodies decline to be interviewed about companies breaking the law?? @EnvAgency @NatResWales  @Feargal_Sharkey @RiverActionUK  @wrurestore

Yet another night our 1 year old has woken up distressed in her nursery due to gases from Red Industries Walley‚Äôs landfill. We can‚Äôt breathe in our own home. Nose bleeds, coughing. Shame on the inept @EnvAgency. @ClareDinnisEA should resign @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL
2.6 miles away from the site and is putrid and thick toxic gas in my home today ruthless and strong all night. My car stinks too @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off NOT OK

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency I think there in hiding and licking there wounds after the panorama show, they know there will probably be an investigation into how they are allowing the levels of pollution that they have been

At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

urls.description: Treatment works are allowed to release sewage into waterways after heavy rain to stop it backing up.

tweets.text:
Water companies illegally dump raw sewage into UK rivers, affecting the health of rivers and creating mountains of wet wipes on river banks. Time we withheld money we pay to these polluters? @thameswater @EnvAgency 
https://t.co/lrp9pCBKPQ

I hope actions follow words so that many 1000s of people and animals affected can be relieved from longstanding suffering. People are already experiencing negative physical and mental health issues. I dread to see the long-term impacts on life and the environment.

#StopTheStink https://t.co/tFtaoMBDOC

tweets.text: @Plasmadreamer @Vig79 @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council Or polluters just do it and rely on the fact that absolutely nothing meaningful will happen or at worst a warning. Growth imperative - they are building something. Box ticked - move on - system broken. Happy to be proved wrong.

Reported the landfill stench to @EnvAgency again, filling my home, all windows/doors closed. This means no sleep for me or my partner who is a key worker and gets off shift at 3am. Disgusting. You need to resolve this. It is unbearable @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink
